CodeList.Name: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Have you had pain other than these everyday kinds of pain today?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Other Than Everyday Kinds

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - On the diagram, shade in the areas where you feel pain.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Areas of Pain

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - On the diagram, put an X on the area that hurts the most.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Area that Hurts Most

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI2-Pain at its Worst in Last 24 Hours
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its worst in the last 24 hours.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain at its Worst in Last 24 Hours

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI2-Pain at its Least in Last 24 Hours
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its least in the last 24 hours.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain at its Least in Last 24 Hours

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain on the average.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain on the Average

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that tells how much pain you have right now.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Right Now

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - What treatments or medications are you receiving for your pain?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Treatments or Medications Receiving for Pain

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - In the last 24 hours, how much relief have pain treatments or medications provided? Please circle the one percentage that most shows how much relief you have received.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Relief from Pain Treatments Provided

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your general activity.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with General Activity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your mood.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Mood

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your walking ability.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Walking Ability

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your normal work.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Normal Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your relations with other people.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Relations

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your sleep.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Sleep

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your enjoyment of life.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Enjoyment of Life

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire BPI Short Form Test Code Terminology
